description: porringer, Queen Anne style; bulbous, bowl-shaped body with flaring lip cast openwork handle attached on one side; handle in keyhole pattern with 9 openings
markings:
engraved in center: [I.C.M.]; on side of bowl opposite handle: [John E. Tilton.May 8,1831]; on side left handle: [L.K.T. July 3,1893]; on side right of handle: [E.R.T. April 22, 1861]
bottom of bowl carries maker\'s marks in center inside: [SB] in cartouche twice
in cartouche, in center of bowl: [S. Burrell]
title: Porringer
